key_themes: AI consolidation and durable winner identification
Earnings guidance revisions in software/fintech (bearish pressure)
Regulatory capital tightening in banking sector
Rate policy uncertainty and sector bifurcation (rate-sensitive vs. structural headwind)
risk_factors: VIX break above 15 threshold triggers cascading liquidations (low liquidity environment amplifies volatility)
Earnings disappointments in enterprise software/fintech cascade sector weakness and narrative reversal
Regulatory announcements on banking capital/compliance constraints tighten financial sector profitability
Parabolic reversal in precious metals and overbought equity conditions signal technical vulnerability
Geopolitical escalation (Taiwan, Ukraine stalemate resolution, Russia peace deal finalization) introduces tail risk and energy market volatility
